description: This waymarked circular walk climbs to Adstone Hill on the Long Mynd near Ratlinghope in the Shropshire Hills. The top of the 369 m (1,211 ft) high hill provides some wonderful views over the Shropshire Hills AONB. You can start the walk from the public car park near the Bridges Pub and Youth Hostel and then head south along the Shropshire Way to reach the hill top. You then descend into Wentnor where you could stop for refreshments at the half way point. The route then heads north along alternative footpaths, running close to the River East Onny which runs through the area.
